main.name: Andy Read
main.description: Establishing a career in software development after 6+ years in the Ecommerce space as a Digital Product Manager and manager of operations.
main.bio: During my career in tech, I have worn a variety of hats. As I continued to work with the web developers at Eddie Bauer, I realized that my invlovement in the web development process sparked my interest the most and decided that software engineering is what I wanted to pursue. Graduated in February 2020 and looking to begin a career in software development! Outside of work I am an avid outdoorsman, mountain guide, skier, woodworker, and dog lover.
main.contactmessage: Interested in connecting with me? Send me a note an I will respond as soon as I can!.

resume.skillmessage: These skills were either learned during my professional career or during software immersion schooling:

education.description: React, Javascript, and Ruby on Rails software immersion greatly enhanced my technical skills and added recent technologies to my portfolio.

education.degree: Bachelors of Science in Economics and Bachelors of Arts in History
education.description: Technical degree in economics complete with regression/statistics/math economics and history degree specializing in Central and Eastern Europe
Study term in the Czech republic designed to expand on economic theory in Econometrics and produce undergraduate thesis.

work.title: Digital Poduct Manager
work.description: Executed all A/B Testing campaigns, managed site operations and data flows, worked closely with developer prioritiziation, and managed multiple business systems and vendor relationships. Implemented user systems including 100 user database and front-end interface for product loads that reduced error rates from 15% to 4% and saved 60K annually

work.title: Senior Product Data Specialist
work.description: Managed the digital product catalog as well as managing business operations around the site issues, promotions, and product data.

work.title: Consultant
work.description: Built an agreement database using Visual Basic to create a UI over Microsoft Advertising and Online division's data warehouse. Allowed tracking and performance tracking for 10k agreements among 29 Monetization Managers and maintained the success of the standardized Long Term Agreements program and a revenue growth of 2.9% in a turbulent division that saw 11.2% declines in revenue.

work.title: Associate Consultant
work.description: Maintained excel-based dashboard connected to SQL to aggregate incentives for Microsoft Surface wholesale partners. Completed consulting projects on-site at Microsoft.

projects.title: Product Preview
projects.category: An E-commerce solution for companies with multiple teams and systems to launchg an accurate and technically sound product.

projects.title: Battlecry(offline to refactor for additional gameplay)
projects.category: A reproduction of the classic hex-based American Civil War board game of the same name.

projects.title: Reddit Analyzer
